Reviews.Title: “Hotel Augustea - Exceptional for 3 stars”

Reviews.Content: location near termini station walking distance major roman sites staff wonderful helpful informative genuinely stay enjoyable 4 star hotels ac fridge tv safe reasonably sized bathroom cold buffet breakfast overall stay value money
